CustomBehavior.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Moving to Sell, Repair and Mail.");

CustomBehavior.Lua: local b=1 for s=1,98 do local n=GetGuildBankItemLink(b,s)if n and strfind(n,"68729")then print("Withdrawing "..n)AutoStoreGuildBankItem(b,s)end end
local b=2 for s=1,98 do local n=GetGuildBankItemLink(b,s)if n and strfind(n,"68729")then print("Withdrawing "..n)AutoStoreGuildBankItem(b,s)end end

local b=4 for s=1,98 do local n=GetGuildBankItemLink(b,s)if n and strfind(n,"68729")then print("Withdrawing "..n)AutoStoreGuildBankItem(b,s)end end
local b=5 for s=1,98 do local n=GetGuildBankItemLink(b,s)if n and strfind(n,"68729")then print("Withdrawing "..n)AutoStoreGuildBankItem(b,s)end end
local b=6 for s=1,98 do local n=GetGuildBankItemLink(b,s)if n and strfind(n,"68729")then print("Withdrawing "..n)AutoStoreGuildBankItem(b,s)end end
